pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sample and Precomputed Data for Use with 'exams.forge' // Provides a small collection of datasets supporting Pearson correlation and linear regression analysis. It includes the precomputed dataset 'sos100', with integer values summing to zero and squared sum equal to 100. For other values of 'n' and user-defined parameters, the 'sos()' function from the 'exams.forge' package can be used to generate datasets on the fly. In addition, the package contains around 500 R Markdown exercises that illustrate the usage of 'exams.forge' commands.
